On this project, students will work together to build a 16 or 32 node PI cluster based on the SDSC Meteor Cluster Project. (Spring Quarter)

  • https://github.com/sdsc/sandbox-cluster-guide
  • SDSC Uses Meteor Raspberry Pi Cluster to Teach Parallel Computing
  • UCSD Supercomputing Center Builds Raspberry Pi Linux Cluster for Education
  • Benchmarking PI Clusters:
    • Benchmarking the Raspberry Pi 4
    • Performance analysis of single board computer clusters

For more information:
SDSC HPC Students Program:
https://www.sdsc.edu/education_and_training/hpc_students.html</a
